response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe holds immense value for individuals like yourself. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an opportunity to acquire this item at a special introductory price. Considering its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure both parties benefit from the transaction while respecting the perceived value of the product to you. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this valuable exchange. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
